snippet.title: HALF LIFE meets DOOM 3 - AREA 51 MOD Reshade Trailer - Revisited
snippet.description:
This is my trailer HALF LIFE meets DOOM 3 - AREA 51 mod. This is one top mod. Recommended for every Doom 3 and Half Life fan. The downside is that it is in Russian and has a weak English translation. It would be great if someone would translate the menus and texts from the game into English. Despite this, the mod has a great atmosphere and pacing. The video speaks for itself!

Played with Reshade. 

Downloaded from here:
https://www.moddb.com/games/area51

Preset:
https://fastupload.io/eb283478e291ec8f

Played on:
CPU: Ryzen 7 5800X3D                           
COOLER: Corsair Hydro H100i iCUE Elite            
VGA: Palit RTX3090 Gamerock 24GB                   
MBO: ASUS TUF GAMING B550-PLUS WIFI II             
RAM: Corsair Vengeance LPX (2 x 16GB, 3600 MHz)     
PSU: Asus ROG STRIX 750G                          
CASE: Be Quiet Pure Base 500 FX
